account.description: Manage your account. Customize your preferences, update your information, and tailor your experience to suit your needs.
account.title: Account

confirmEmail.description: Confirm your email address to complete the registration process and enjoy the full range of features and services we offer.
confirmEmail.title: Confirm Email

dashboard.description: Explore your personalized dashboard. Access insights, manage preferences, and stay connected with the latest updates all in one place.
dashboard.title: Dashboard

home.description: Welcome to the Project Starter. Explore a world of possibilities, discover engaging content, and make the most of your online experience.
home.title: Home

login.description: Securely log in to your account. Access exclusive features, personalized content, and stay connected.
login.title: Login

notFound.description: Oops. The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Navigate back to our homepage.

recoverPassword.description: Recover access to your account effortlessly. Follow the steps to reset your password and regain control of your online experience.
recoverPassword.title: Recover Password

register.description: Get started with a free account today. Join our community, enjoy personalized content, and experience a seamless online journey tailored just for you.
register.title: Register

resetPassword.description: Reset your password. Follow the simple steps to create a new password and secure your account.
resetPassword.title: Reset Password
